column1: Cognate with Old Turkic 𐰽𐰺𐰃𐰍 ‎(sarıɣ, “yellow”), Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(sarıɣ, “yellow”), Old Uighur [script needed] ‎(sarıɣ, “yellow”), Azeri sarı ‎(“yellow”), Bashkir һары ‎(harï, “yellow”), Chuvash шурӑ ‎(šură, “white”), Kazakh сары ‎(sarı, “yellow”), Khakas сарығ ‎(sarığ, “yellow”), Kyrgyz сары ‎(sarı, “yellow”), Tatar сары ‎(sarı, “yellow”), Turkmen sāry ‎(“yellow”), Tuvan сарыг ‎(sarıg, “yellow”), Uyghur سېرىق ‎(sëriq, “yellow”), Uzbek sariq ‎(“yellow”), Yakut араҕас ‎(arağas, “yellow”), арыы ‎(arıı, “butter”).
*Not used, but perhaps rarely - chiefly grammatical formations. Note: Plural forms are not used with adjectives.
